name: Mark Collins Painters & Decorators
overview:
Mark Collins and his staff believe that they are the No.1 Painters & Decorators for customer satisfaction, and would love the opportunity to prove this to you.

Mark has built, and hopes to continue building a good reputation in the painting and decorating industry. This reputation is built on the foundations of honesty, high standards of work, good time keeping and most importantly, customer satisfaction.

Our staff are time served and highly skilled decorators. We are happy to undertake all jobs and we value every customer. Let us surprise you with our highly competitive no obligation quotes.

We cover the whole of Glasgow, Cumbernauld and surrounding areas.

Read our reviews at http://www.freeindex.co.uk/profile(mark-collins-no1-decor)_338794.htm
